name: mass
rules:
Provinces/Principalities convert:
- A Principality converts if as many are on it as the Principality has provinces. If not enough dice were placed, the Principality does not convert.
- Dice of your own religion on your provinces cancel up to 2 dice of the opposing religion placed on the same province. 

Remove all canceled dice. Dice of an opposing religion remaining then convert the province they are on and are discarded. Players always have at least one province of the correct religion, preventing conversions.

name: religiousUpheavalLate
rules: Pick two Catholic Principalities and convert them to Protestantism.

name: religiousUpheavalEarly
rules: Pick 3 Catholic Principalities and convert them to Protestantism. In addition, if you have at least one Catholic province adjacent to a converted Principality, convert one province to Protestantism.

name: piusOttomans
rules: Conclude the Council of Trent. Catholic players may now do the Intercession of Saints action.

name: deathOfEmperor
rules: The Emperor is dead! If this is the 5th time the Emperor dies, determine the winner(s), otherwise, hold an Imperial Election.

name: jesuitOrder
rules: Catholic players each gain 2 Faith dice. Saved Catholic players gain an additional Faith die.

name: peasantsWar
rules: Declare war on the most Powerful player. If you are the most Powerful, declare a war against the next most powerful.

name: imperialBan
rules: The Emperor may remove all Influence from one Principality of their choice. All players of the Emperor's religion gain 1 Influence.

name: defenestration
rules: Convert the largest elector on the board that isn't your religion to your religion.

name: danishIntervention
rules: Protestant players gain 1 Influence. Place a Religious Upheaval marker on any Catholic Principality that isn't bordering the Emperor.

name: frenchIntervention
rules: Catholic players gain 1 Influence. Place a Religious Upheaval marker on any Protestant Principality adjacent to the Emperor.

name: imperialReforms
rules: The Emperor gains 2 Influence. All players of the Emperor's religion gain 1 Influence.

name: lutherDeath
rules: All Protestant players must lose 1 Influence on the board or lose 1 Faith die in play.

name: calvinismRises
rules: Protestant players may each convert one of their provinces for free. Protestant players gain one Faith die if they control 3 or more Protestant provinces.

name: dietOfWorms
rules: If you do not share the Emperor's religion, take one of your Influence off the board. As the Emperor, gain 1 Influence on the board for each player of the opposing religion.

name: stBartholomew
rules: Each Protestant player loses all Influence in a Catholic Principality of their choice.

name: gutenbergBible
rules: All players gain 1 Faith die. Protestant players may place these Faith dice immediately on any province they control or any adjacent province.

name: leipzigDebate
rules: Each Protestant player may attempt to convert Catholic provinces by rolling up to 2 Protestant Faith dice either in storage or in play. On a roll of 4+, the province converts. Catholic players gain 1 Influence for each failed conversion attempt.

name: edictOfNantes
rules: Remove all Religious Upheaval markers and Faith dice from the board.

name: diplomaticManeuvering
rules: Take turns moving up to 2 of your Influence tokens between any Principalities you have Influence with.

name: religiousFervor
rules: Players of the Emperor's religion gain 1 Faith die.
